name: Torrential
description:
Navigate a torrential rain of bullets from all sides as you unlock one thrilling level after another with simple mechanics, four keys, and a space bar.

Lose yourself in the mesmerizing bullet spray as you challenge yourself through ten levels of increasing difficulty. This is a simple game by design to keep the focus on the bullets.

This single-player, Indie-created bullet hell includes three difficulty levels, but keeps it accessible with auto aim, simple controls, and low spec requirements.
